attributes.action: Liverpool City backs Liverpool Waters scheme
attributes.additional_details:
We as residents of the city back the Liverpool waters scheme proposed by peel holdings. This innovative project will create up to twenty thousand urgently needed jobs for the city. £5.5 billion will be plowed into this project, it will boost business and the economy within the city which we need at this difficult time.
To turn this down would be crazy, please support this petition!!
